channel.title: cdnjs.com - library updates
channel.description: Track when new libraries are added and old libraries updated!

item.title: select2 was updated to version 3.3.1
item.description: Select2 is a jQuery based replacement for select boxes. It supports searching, remote data sets, and infinite scrolling of results. Look and feel of Select2 is based on the excellent Chosen library.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jquery.qrcode(1.0) was added
item.description: A jquery plugin for a pure browser qrcode generation.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: require.js was updated to version 2.1.5
item.description: RequireJS is a JavaScript file and module loader. It is optimized for in-browser use, but it can be used in other JavaScript environments, like Rhino and Node
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: hammer.js was updated to version 1.0.3
item.description: A javascript library for multi-touch gestures :// You can touch this
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: q.js(0.9.2) was added
item.description: A library for promises (CommonJS/Promises/A,B,D)
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: angular-strap was updated to version 0.7.1
item.description: AngularStrap - Twitter Bootstrap directives for AngularJS.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: coffee-script was updated to version 1.6.2
item.description: CoffeeScript is a little language that compiles into JavaScript. Underneath all of those embarrassing braces and semicolons, JavaScript has always had a gorgeous object model at its heart. CoffeeScript is an attempt to expose the good parts of JavaScript in a simple way.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: masonry was updated to version 2.1.08
item.description: A dynamic layout plugin for jQuery.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: graphael was updated to version 0.5.1
item.description: gRaphael's goal is to help you create stunning charts on your website. It is based on Raphaël graphics library.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: bootstrap-tour(0.2.0) was added
item.description: Quick and easy product tours with Twitter Bootstrap Popovers.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: three.js was updated to version r57
item.description: three.js is a lightweight 3D library with a very low level of complexity. The library provides <canvas>, <svg> and WebGL renderers.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: qtip2 was updated to version 2.0.1
item.description: Pretty powerful tooltips. The second generation of the advanced qTip plugin for the ever popular jQuery framework.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: backbone-pageable was updated to version 1.2.0
item.description: A pageable Backbone.Collection superset. Supports server-side/client-side/infinite pagination and sorting.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jquery-instagram(0.2.2) was added
item.description: Instagram jQuery plugin
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: backbone.js was updated to version 1.0.0
item.description: Backbone supplies structure to JavaScript-heavy applications by providing models with key-value binding and custom events, collections with a rich API of enumerable functions, views with declarative event handling, and connects it all to your existing application over a RESTful JSON interface.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: backbone.paginator was updated to version 0.6
item.description: Pagination component for backbone.js
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: dropbox.js was updated to version 0.9.2
item.description: Client library for the Dropbox API
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: breezejs(1.2.5) was added
item.description: BreezeJS is a JavaScript library for managing data in data rich-client HTML/JS applications. Core features include client-side querying, caching, change-tracking, validation, batch saves.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jquery.selectboxit was updated to version 3.3.0
item.description: A jQuery plugin that progressively enhances an HTML Select Box into a single option dropdown list. The dropdown list can be optionally styled with jQuery ThemeRoller and optionally animated with jQueryUI show/hide effects.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: foundation was updated to version 4.0.9
item.description: The most advanced responsive front-end framework in the world. Quickly create prototypes and production code for sites and apps that work on any kind of device.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: gsap was updated to version 1.9.1
item.description: GreenSock Animation Platform (GSAP) is a suite of tools for scripted animation, including TweenLite, TweenMax, TimelineLite, TimelineMax, various easing equations (EasePack), plugins for things like animating along Bezier paths, tweening RaphaelJS objects, etc. and it also includes a jQuery plugin that hijacks the native jQuery.animate() method so that animations perform much better and additional properties can be tweened, like colors, transforms (2D and 3D), boxShadow, borderRadius, clip, and lots more. GSAP has no dependencies on jQuery and it can animate ANY numeric property of ANY object.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jqcloud(1.0.3) was added
item.description: jQCloud is a jQuery plugin that builds neat and pure HTML + CSS word clouds and tag clouds that are actually shaped like a cloud.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jquery.superlabels(2.0.3) was added
item.description: Give your forms a helping of awesome!
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: tabletop.js(1.1.0) was added
item.description: Tabletop.js takes a Google Spreadsheet and makes it easily accessible through JavaScript.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: rickshaw was updated to version 1.2.1
item.description: JavaScript toolkit for creating interactive real-time graphs
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: messenger(1.2.3) was added
item.description: Client-side growl-like notifications with actions and auto-retry.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jqueryui was updated to version 1.10.2
item.description: jQuery UI provides abstractions for low-level interaction and animation, advanced effects and high-level, themeable widgets, built on top of the jQuery JavaScript Library, that you can use to build highly interactive web applications.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: ResponsiveSlides.js was updated to version 1.53
item.description: Simple & lightweight responsive slider plugin
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: require-text was updated to version 2.0.5
item.description: A RequireJS/AMD loader plugin for loading text resources.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jstimezonedetect(1.0.4) was added
item.description: This script gives you the zone info key representing your device's time zone setting.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jquery.mask(0.7.5) was added
item.description: A jQuery Plugin to make input mask field.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: fabric.js(1.1.0) was added
item.description: A powerful and simple Javascript canvas library
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: d3 was updated to version 3.0.8
item.description: A small, free JavaScript library for manipulating documents based on data.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: backbone.marionette was updated to version 1.0.0-rc6-bundled
item.description: Make your Backbone.js apps dance with a composite application architecture!
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jquery-validate was updated to version 1.11.0
item.description: Form Validation plugin for jQuery
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: chosen was updated to version 0.9.12
item.description: Chosen is a JavaScript plugin that makes long, unwieldy select boxes much more user-friendly. It is currently available in both jQuery and Prototype flavors.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: backbone.layoutmanager was updated to version 0.8.4
item.description: A layout and template manager for Backbone.js applications.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: jquery-placeholder(2.0.7) was added
item.description: A jQuery plugin that enables HTML5 placeholder behavior for browsers that aren’t trying hard enough yet.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]

item.title: pubnub was updated to version 3.4.2
item.description: PubNub, a new kind of Cloud-Hosted Broadcasting Service for Mass Communication.
item.dc:creator: [object Object]
